info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 28 at 1:41PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Brantley, east central Ware and northwestern Charlton Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 141 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles west of Race Pond, or 13 miles north of Stephen Foster State Park, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stephen Foster State Park and Race Pond. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
